content.webTitle: Rock review: The Week That Was, The Week That Was

fields.headline: Rock review: The Week That Was, The Week That Was
fields.bodyText: Field Music mainstay Peter Brewis follows brother David into the solo fast lane with this intricate yet accessible fantasia for vibraphone, flute, strings and cornet. Brewis colonises the middle ground between Caravan and Heaven 17 with rapacious aplomb. Of all the 32-minute concept albums inspired by Paul Auster to come out of Sunderland this year, it's comfortably the best.
